Description: Format used to display location contents listing.
Values: list for a list of objects; bubbles for left-floated bubbles

Description: Determines whether the bundle uses object-location references or movements to track object location.
Values: ca_storage_locations for direct object-location references; ca_movements for movement-based tracking

Description: Layout for each object in the storage location (can include HTML). The template is evaluated relative to each object-movement or object-location relationship. Element code tags prefixed with the ^ character can be used to represent the value in the template. For example: ^ca_objects.prefered_labels,name (^ca_objects.idno).
Color to use as highlight for each object in the storage location.
